attributes.action: remove first class compartments from commuter trains
attributes.additional_details: lets call time  on empty seats in first class compartments  on commuter trains into london the elderly, disabled, families with  young children ,forced to stand whilst these seats remain empty, then being asked to move  on by some jobsworth, in many cases the only difference in the seats is the material to cover them, there is no first class sections on the tube network nor on buses  .lets put first class compartments into the history books

rejection.details: This is a matter for the train operating companies.
